issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.description: ARROW-14850 changed the default {{ARROW_DEPENDENCY_SOURCE}} to {{AUTO}} in nixlibs, this cleans it up the default in build_arrow_static.sh to match
fields.summary: [R] Clean up from setting deps_source to auto
